pages.text: Indeed victory is for those who control themselves
Fenced gardens and vineyards
and fully developed maidens of the same age
and overflowing cups
They do not hear any useless talk or any lies in there
A reward from your Master, a calculated reward
(a reward from the) Master of the skies and the earth and whatever is between them, the beneficent. They do not have any authority from Him to talk
A day when the spirit and the angels stand in a row, they do not speak except anyone whom the beneficent permits him and he says what is right
This is the day of the truth. Therefore anyone who wants, he takes a way of return to his Master
Indeed We warned you of a forthcoming punishment, a day when a person looks at what his hands sent ahead, and the disbeliever says: I wish I was dust
By those who pull out intensely
and by those who let out gently
and by those who swim/float smoothly
and by those who move ahead, outpacing
and by those who manage an affair
on a day that the earthquake shakes (the earth)
the subsequent one follows it
on that day hearts tremble
their eyes humbled (looking down)
they say: will we be restored to the original form
even when we are decomposed bones
They say: then that would be a losing return
Then it is only a single scream
and they are immediately awake
Did the story of Moses come to you
